name: getComments
description:
Returns all comments for an issue.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** Comments are included in the response where the user has:

 *  *Browse projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project containing the comment.
 *  If [issue-level security](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/J4lKLg) is configured, issue-level security permission to view the issue.
 *  If the comment has visibility restrictions, belongs to the group or has the role visibility is role visibility is restricted to.

issueIdOrKey.description: The ID or key of the issue.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

orderBy.description: [Order](#ordering) the results by a field. Accepts *created* to sort comments by their created date.

expand.description: Use [expand](#expansion) to include additional information about comments in the response. This parameter accepts `renderedBody`, which returns the comment body rendered in HTML.

$ul: **maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
